block.p: Stacey Reiss and Ross Bryan Intelisano were married yesterday at Gedney Farm in New Marlborough, Mass., by Justice Jeremy S. Weinstein of New York State Supreme Court in Manhattan.

Ms. Reiss, 30, is keeping her name. She is a producer at ''Dateline NBC'' in Manhattan. She graduated from the University of Wisconsin at Madison. She is the daughter of Judy Grill of Sherman Oaks, Calif., and M. Freddie Reiss of Pacific Palisades, Calif.
Stacey Reiss and Ross Bryan Intelisano were married yesterday at Gedney Farm in New Marlborough, Mass., by Justice Jeremy S. Weinstein of New York State Supreme Court in Manhattan.

Ms. Reiss, 30, is keeping her name. She is a producer at ''Dateline NBC'' in Manhattan. She graduated from the University of Wisconsin at Madison. She is the daughter of Judy Grill of Sherman Oaks, Calif., and M. Freddie Reiss of Pacific Palisades, Calif.

Mr. Intelisano, 30, is an associate at Eppenstein & Eppenstein, a Manhattan law firm. He graduated from Lehigh University and Brooklyn Law School. He is a son of Sharon and Robert Intelisano of Belle Harbor, N.Y.
